name: Yuri Santana
title: DevRel
bio: Yuri is a Dominican who switched from law to programming during the pandemic, currently works as a DevRel and creates content to help those people who are just starting their way in tech (code newbies) and those who are already more experienced. She is part of several DevRel and programming communities including an active participation in DevRelX and has given talks for the GitHub community in Spanish. She is always learning new things and connecting with the community.
